amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove all Davis-Bacon prevailing wage provisions from the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-36 to remove all Davis-Bacon prevailing wage provisions from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mack amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 284 (Roll no. 122).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Mack.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mack amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 284 (Roll no. 122).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
